title: The Fluent Spanish House
descriptionTitle: "I have known firsthand the Spanish learners' struggles to get fluent in my language. Memorizing rules and vocabulary aren't the keys to fluency. You need to build a strong grammar foundation. My courses provide guidance and solutions, take a step further!"

cardsBlog.title: None is plural or singular
cardsBlog.content: Hola, dear student. No matter what level of Spanish you have. This interests you üòè.

cardsBlog.title: What are you talking about?
cardsBlog.content: Hello, friend. In some English-speaking countries siesta, party, or patio is used. Well, Spanish speakers also us.

cardsBlog.title: How we say somebody?
cardsBlog.content: Hello, dear student, for the record I want you to know that I don't like tripe üòè.

cardsBlog.title: Adapting
cardsBlog.content: Hello, dear student. Lifestyles change and we change with them.

contact: Ask me any question you have
